> Plot:
>
> Jerry is a junkyard worker who attempts 
> to sabotage a power plant he suspects of 
> causing his headaches. But he inadvertently 
> causes his brain to become magnetized, leading 
> to the unintentional destruction of all the movies
> in his friend&#039;s store. In order to keep the store&#039;s
> one loyal customer, an elderly lady with a tenuous 
> grasp on reality, the pair re-create a long line of
> films including The Lion King, Rush Hour, Ghostbusters,
> When We Were Kings, Driving Miss Daisy, and Robocop,
> putting themselves and their townspeople into it. They 
> become the biggest stars in their neighborhood.
> A small VHS only video store faces foreclosure in
> a poor community. While watching the store for the owner,
> a blundering employee&#039;s friend accidentally erases all of
> the tapes. In order to keep their blunder from becoming apparent,
> the duo of Mos Def and Jack Black begin remaking the films 
> themselves using homemade special effects and outdated filming techniques
